import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './Cart.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { fetchCart, removeFromCart, changeProductQuantity} from '../../Features/Cart' import Axios, { ImagePath } from '../../Axios' import Navbar from '../../Components/Navbar/NavBar' function Cart() { const {isAthu} =useSelector(satae=>satae.user) const dispatch = useDispatch() {} useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchCart()) }, [dispatch]) const { cartInfo,total } = useSelector(state => state.cart) const changeQuantity = (quantity, id,price) => { dispatch(changeProductQuantity({ id, quantity,price })) Axios.put(`cart/change-product-quantity/${id}`, { quantity }).then(res => { if (res.data.status) { } }) } const removeCartProduct = id => { dispatch(removeFromCart(id)) Axios.put('cart/remove-product/' + id, { id: id }).then(res => { }) } return (
